item.description:
Continuing on our trip around the world, the next stop is South America!  Join us for an evening of white wines from our southern neighbors.

Due to a lack of volunteers, you'll have to put up with me as tasting tour guide yet again.  :)

If you've always wanted to try a Torrontes or Pedro Ximenez wine come on down and join us.

 

Appetizers always appreciated as usual!

 

Thanks,

Noel

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Ole! South America Whites
